website_summaries.verdict: If you suffer from sore and tired feet, this massager is one of the best in terms of massage quality and reducing soreness.
pros: Stands out for its deep kneading Shiatsu massage action
An unobtrusive addition to your office setup
cons: Some say it's a bit on the noisy side

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my husband because his feet hurt all ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband because his feet hurt all the time..sadly the arches of his feet are too high and the rotating massage balls do not go up high enough to do anything.. So if you have high arches do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina A Roland

customer_reviews.title: The massage action is actually pretty good. Your feet will feel buzzy after you ...
customer_reviews.text: The massage action is actually pretty good. Your feet will feel buzzy after you finish using it. The heat however is another matter. It is comparable to french fries that you send back because they have a hint of warm but aren't at all hot. I don't know what I was expecting but it wasn't inconsequential "is this thing on?" heat. I even called the mfg and they confirmed that was it's design. I would rather it actually feel warmer and soothing than those silly red lights that do nothing. If you just want a massager great if you are hoping for soothing heat in addition look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Rick J.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best choice, noisy and rough on feet
customer_reviews.text: Give a very strong massage if that's what you're looking for, I was not. Somewhat Noisy and heat is not very strong. Outer cover is rather thin and doesn't protect feet from massage balls. I think There are better devices in this price range so don't just buy it because you've heard brand name. I recommend Beuer, it's very quiet and much easier on your feet yet gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: E. Constable

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye Pain!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect gift for an aging parent who has arthritic feet. With many foot massage units, you have to slip your feet into a contained area and it "squeezes" your foot during the massage - but my parent's arthritis makes that impossible (and painful). To be able to place your feet atop the Homedics unit is perfect for Mom. To get relief, she simply pushed the start button with her toe or heel (doesn't even have to bend down to start the unit). She loves this foot massager and uses it every day to ease her pain.
customer_reviews.author: ActiveShopperGal

customer_reviews.title: It works alright for my plantar fasciitis but I'd recommend another unit
customer_reviews.text: Little deceptive on 18 modes. There are only 2 modes heated or not. They are trying to count each side turn balls. They only go one direction and don't change speed or rythem. It works alright for my plantar fasciitis but I'd recommend another unit. Pay for upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: W. J. Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: I loved it and looked forward to relaxing in my chair ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas present for myself to see if it would help my debilitating foot pain caused from several different conditions brought on by chemo several years ago. I loved it and looked forward to relaxing in my chair with my heated foot massager every evening ... until I couldn't. Just 2 months after purchasing it, it just wouldn't power up one day - just dead. I was SO disappointed because it really did seem to help, but not worth it if it only lasts for 2 months. :( I'm tempted to try buying it one more time, but the return cut-off is less than 2 months after purchase so I am afraid of losing more money.
customer_reviews.author: Goldilocks

customer_reviews.title: It does not heat
customer_reviews.text: It does not heat. You have to turn it on and let it run for 30+ minutes before it heats. I own one of these from another brand and it heats within a minute or two
customer_reviews.author: BookTea

customer_reviews.title: Garbage....Just garbage.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband as a Christmas present. He suffers from plantar fasciitis and thought this would help him relieve some of his pain. It worked for five seconds out of the box and then stopped. The look of disappointment on his face broke my heart. This foot massager is a piece of junk and I don’t recommend this at all. I will be returning it first thing tomorrow at a ups store and I will never ever buy another Homemedics product again.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: terrible. motor is way too fast. came reppackaged. sold as new but was actually USED!! Ripoff
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: MY WIFE USES IT EVERYDAY
customer_reviews.text: My wife has problems with her feet and so I bought this for her. She says it's great and relieves the pain in her feet for about 24 hours. I find it's difficult to make complete contact with my arches and I can't take the Shiatsu massaging for very long, but it's not for me. She gives it 5 stars, so I did. The heating element is moderate at best which I guess is good. It obviously doesn't envelope the entire foot, but I can't imagine that the ones that do actually massage the tops of your feet. If they do, I can imagine it being painful.
customer_reviews.author: Finn

customer_reviews.title: This thing is magic...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 1 for my 84 year old mother hoping it would help her with circulation and her gout. After 2 days of use, all swelling was gone and she has had none now for months (she uses twice and day and LOVES it) So since she loves hers so much I got one. I use for 30 minutes at night and it relaxes my muscles and increases circulation so much it greatly reduces the stiffness in my legs and hips at the end of the day. I don't have the words how much we love ours.
customer_reviews.author: A Texas Reader

customer_reviews.title: Anyone who works on their feet needs this!
customer_reviews.text: I work 12 hour shifts on my feet, this was my treat to myself and I'm so happy I bought it. Does it take the place of a real foot massage? No, but it's better than whining to my husband for a foot rub. The heat setting didn't get very warm. But this is very relaxing and my sore feet sure feel better when I'm done.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great massage
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas Gift from my husband as I am on my feet all day and bug him for a foot massage after work 😂😂 This is amazing, the heat feature takes a little bit of time but feels great, and I love how refreshed my feet feel. It is always plugged in by my couch and I will be using it daily!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy shaw

customer_reviews.title: It was horrible. I bought this and I tried it out ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got this. I stand on my feet for over eight hours everyday and my feet were killing me. It was at a point where after sitting for a few minutes I could hardly stand. It was horrible. I bought this and I tried it out for five minutes. I could feel the knot getting worked out. I was able to adjust the amount of pressure being applied which was great. After five minutes I was able to stand with no pain. I can't wait until I get this thing home and can use it for more than five minutes, but so far I am beyond impressed and happy that the pain is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Baker

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not all that great! Feels more like a tickle then a massage... wish I could send back :(
customer_reviews.author: MissJess

customer_reviews.title: TIRED FEET A THING OF THE PAST..
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for about four years..since my purchase my sister, granddaughter and the lady that does my mani/pedicures have purchased a HoMedics foot massager..TIRED FEET ARE A THING OF THE PAST..by God's Grace I'm celebrating my 61st bday..and am SO GRATEFUL..HoMedics YOU ROCK
customer_reviews.author: DinaAnn7

customer_reviews.title: Is it worth $40 to you to make your mother-in-law happy? You bet.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Just plug it in and push 1 button to select either warm or cool mode and the rotating rollers do the rest. In 15 minutes, your feet feel noticeably more relaxed. Great to use just before bed to help relax your feet. So good that I gave family members this for Christmas. They ALL love it, too. Is it worth $40 to you to make your mother-in-law happy? You bet.
customer_reviews.author: B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Tickles at first and then is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas gift. It warms up quickly and after you get past the initial couple minutes of tickling, it feels amazing! My feet are extremely ticklish, but it really does get better after a few minutes. It's kind of big and bulky so I don't like leaving it out, but stores in the closet nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mother fro Mothers' Day. It arrived right on time this afternoon. Mom says it is perfect. She carries it around from room to room to use it everywhere. The price is more than reasonable, it is lightweight therefore easy to carry. That it heats as well as massages her feet really keeps her legs from aching.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Sherrod

customer_reviews.title: Awesome foot massager!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a real treat for under $50! My son and I have been using this foot massager everyday since it arrived and love it! It has made my running less painful and my feet feel great. Not sure how you can go wrong for under $50 and wish I would have bought this months ago when I put it in my Wish List to buy later. If you have sore feet for any reason, then this machine is for you!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mazzeo

customer_reviews.title: a tennis ball worked faster and better for my feet
customer_reviews.text: Works okay. Heats up well. I have to bear down on it for it to work my feet though, otherwise it's just moving without actually doing anything. So I can't really sit back and relax, I have to sit up and forward a bit. To be honest, a tennis ball worked faster and better for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Rowbee

customer_reviews.title: Nice after a long day.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Treasure Truck gift for Mothers Day and I love it! It's a nice way to relax after a hard day. It does take a while to get used to if you have ridiculously ticklish feet like me. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MomOfTwo

customer_reviews.title: Great product for reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: The massager is great as it provides a feel for relief on the feet. The heat setting is not really strong and almost you don't feel it. It was my first time trying this type of massager and I'm happy with the product and price,just wish you can heat your feet a little bit more.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome...until it died.
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this for my tired feet...it did exactly what you would want it to do. I had it since December 2018, but today I come home from work, kick off my shoes, push the button....and....nothing. It completely died for some reason. I would give it 5 stars if it was still working, but 8 months?
customer_reviews.author: Rudolph Cassol

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done just fine
customer_reviews.text: Wow wow wow this item is incredible. It feels so good I honestly don’t wanna stop using it. I had to write this review.....I stand for 11-12 hours/day on concrete floors. My feet are usually pretty tired and sore when I get home, until I bought this massager. I just wish the heat setting would go higher. It definitely gets the job done tho, a little expensive but worth it I guess. A++ highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kcork

customer_reviews.title: No arch love
customer_reviews.text: This was awkward. The rollers removed your feet off the device and only rotated clockwise or counterclockwise so it did not massage my arches, which was my main reason for buying. If your arches need love, this one is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: I personally would like something that makes me feel like I do when ...
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for my boyfriend. He's always complaining about aching feet because he's on it all day. He likes it. I tried it and for me, I wish the kneading was deeper and harder. To me this just kind tickles your feet without intensity. I personally would like something that makes me feel like I do when I'm at the massage spa getting my feet massaged. Boyfriend is happy with it so it's a win win.
customer_reviews.author: No H.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get a lot of use from it- I liked the concept but didn't really give me much relief. The pattern it moves didn't feel great on my feet and the heat wasn't really significant. It now sits collecting dust
customer_reviews.author: pigpen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Not really giving you a deep massage but good enough to keep comforting and circulating my feet after my long day at work. For the price $50 it is doing the job. Easy to move around and easy to use. I bought one for myself and one for my friend.
customer_reviews.author: rain_real

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift. Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2015 as a “I’m terrible at giving gifts on personal level” gift. Lol.. It was an additional kind of thing. Anyways, it works well(still).. Heats up fast, if you want the heat... And why wouldn’t you?... Just take a seat, throw your feet on here and it’s not a bad experience. My mom liked it and I’ve thrown my feet on while visiting.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: A non-effective shiatsu massager.
customer_reviews.text: This foot massager did nothing other than jiggle my feet. It was not a shiatsu style massager in my experience. I do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia H.

customer_reviews.title: Great heated massager!
customer_reviews.text: This thing feels good! After working on my feet for 12 hours, give me 10-15 minutes with this and I am ready for a walk around the property. Wear socks when you use it. The massager tickles at first, but as you adjust the amount of pressure that you put on your feet, it feels really great. The hear feature is great as well, especially during this cold time.
customer_reviews.author: R. McCormack

customer_reviews.title: Treat to My Feet!
customer_reviews.text: I have been eyeing this for a loooong time. Finally caved and glad that I did; it feels fabulous. I gave it four stars because you must lean into it for it to really massage well. I have to lean forward and rest my elbows on my knees. It's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Smithy

customer_reviews.title: just ok...
customer_reviews.text: The balls seem too small and tend to hurt my feet on the cool setting. They don't feel as bad on the heated setting. The placement of the balls is too far apart for me (size 8 wmn). I'm constantly shifting my feet around to get to the sore parts of my feet. I would recommend purchasing something better than this. Not terrible but not really worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Speechie

customer_reviews.title: Can cause damage to foot
customer_reviews.text: Hey All, Was extremely comfort in low.settings..easy to out pressure inadvertently that can cause damage to foot (did for.me!)
customer_reviews.author: Vivek Raman

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. But, if you have 'ticklish' feet you may not be able to use it. I have restless leg syndrome and sharp pain in my feet that make it almost impossible to sleep some nights. Using this for about 15 minutes seems to help. It does hurt at first but it's kind of like "hurts so good". Maybe it's the 'reflexology' type of massage that works, I don't know. All I know is that my feet feel better and I am able to get some sleep after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Oberlies

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work on high arches
customer_reviews.text: I have had many foot surgeries and my feet are always suffering. For me, the middle set of rollers did not touch my arches at all, where I need the most relief. This unit also is not height or slant adjustable. For basic feet, it might be okay.
customer_reviews.author: Velikova

customer_reviews.title: I gave this to my father in law as a gift to help with circulation
customer_reviews.text: I have one similar to this one and purchased it for my father in law who has some circulation issues. I am hoping it helps with his feet and legs. I know it helps me and feels good.
customer_reviews.author: jeannette daniels

customer_reviews.title: Achy Foot rub
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use but not that great. I would want to try another product
customer_reviews.author: Bell3

customer_reviews.title: He will poor a cocktail after work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who has MS; after a long day his feet are very sore and fatigued. He will poor a cocktail after work, put on a record and plop his feet on this device. It helps him alot, and I enjoy it too.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Stiner

customer_reviews.title: Very relaxing
customer_reviews.text: Massages my feet with or without heat. I use mine while sitting on my living room chair watching tv. It helps me relax and takes the stress off my feet and mind.
customer_reviews.author: Patriot

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Wow I really needed this. Works great, feels great, mild heat, very quiet. Feet are a little close together but I wouldn’t want a wider unit. It’s an everyday treat.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Miller

customer_reviews.title: Helping ease my Plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for about 2 weeks at least every other day and it has eased up my Plantar fasciitis quite a bit. I don't do the exercises or anything that I should be doing - but leaving my feet on this for 20 minutes really works to stretch and relax the tendons. My feet still hurt when I initially stand, but after a step or two its gone and they don't hurt at all when I'm off them now. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lozaka

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who is very picky about any kind of massager. It works great!! It definitely gives a great massage. The only comment I would have is that the heat is very minimal...don't expect much with that...but the massage is great!!
customer_reviews.author: HMW

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's because I'm not standing on my feet all day but this gadget doesn't do much for me. I'm sorry I threw the box out or I'd be sending it back. My son uses it after he takes long walks with the dog but it's nothing extraordinary in his opinion as well. Just a mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardine Cizmar

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like it. The size / spacing of the ball bearings were not suitable for my size 7 women’s. I think it would work best for shoe sizes 10
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy again. Quality isn't great. Very painful to use
customer_reviews.text: Painfully. Cover it too thin and rollers are very hard so when you put you feet on it, it is very uncomfortable and hurts. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Shay51

customer_reviews.title: I like that the blue lights are normal temperature and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what my tired feet need after a long day. I like that the blue lights are normal temperature and the red lights are slightly heated. You can really apply counter pressure to the machine to get your feet where it hurts. Nothing really replaces a true massage and I don't like the machines that just vibrate, so for the price I am happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Dana S

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Some fellow plantar fasciitis sufferer felt that this helped them. Only surgery helped me, however, if you want your feet to have a bit of massage, it's ok.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Cat

customer_reviews.title: returned
customer_reviews.text: The description that comes with this is not the same as on the amazon product page.
customer_reviews.author: Northern

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, not so good implementation.
customer_reviews.text: Good product idea and it fit my size 13 feet (which was a pleasant surprise), however, the single speed for the massaging elements unit left my feet (and my wife's feet) feeling not very relaxed. I had to have thick socks on to use it. Others have commented that the massage is too hard. I agree and this could have been easily remedied with a fast and slow mode or a user variable speed control. I returned the unit. On the plus side, the unit was sturdy and had lots of power. The heat mode worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn, P.E.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my aunt for Christmas and let me tell you that she loves it. She goes home everyday after working as a nurse and uses it. It is still going strong and she loves it. I am very happy with this purchase and based on the feedback from her I would highly recommend buying this if you are in the market for a great foot massage tool.
customer_reviews.author: JelloSayHello

customer_reviews.title: Lovin' this!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this unit. I have it under my desk in my home office & I usually have it on & am using it every day. I like the heat option too. It feels sort of strong until you get used to it. You can change the intensity by how much pressure you use when you put your feet on it. Mine does not seem to have an auto-shut-off but for me that is fine. The quality seems nice & it feels pretty sturdy. I'd buy this one again!
customer_reviews.author: Ella Belle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for my feet
customer_reviews.text: I have issues with my feet and this product helps me greatly. It gets all the knots out and relieves pain in my feet. Love the red light.
customer_reviews.author: Khadejah

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing after a hard days work.
customer_reviews.text: I walk on the concrete all day for work. Quality shoes are a necessity for industrial work. I use this massager when I come home and it helps my feet feel relaxed. It takes a couple uses to get used to but it becomes relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: James Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Foot saver!!! I suffer from a lot of pain in my feet and by the end of day it’s almost unbearable but I use this right when I get home from work and it’s heaven!
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice Bates

customer_reviews.title: slipshoddy product
customer_reviews.text: Well I purchased this for my wife this Christmas. It worked for a total of 11 minutes, before the heat selection stopped working then the power switch would not turn it off. I had to unplug it in order to shut it off. Plus, the box wasn't even concealed upon delivery. Just sat out on the porch in the original box. When in operation it did a decent job, so I can't give it a complete 0. Oh well, amazon refunded it with no questions.
customer_reviews.author: Rich 777

customer_reviews.title: I've bought two of these because I loved the one I got for myself
customer_reviews.text: I've bought two of these because I loved the one I got for myself. The instructions state that one should wear socks as the massage heads are hard but I did not find this to be the case. I spend so many hours daily walking all over the Chicago downtown area with work that the daily massage benefits of this very reasonably-priced product are worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa G Wilson

customer_reviews.title: It feels good initially but after a minute it really starts to ...
customer_reviews.text: It feels good initially but after a minute it really starts to hurt your feet. The rotators inside the machine seem to be made of metal rather than a comfortable rubber that would massage the feet
customer_reviews.author: Ron Stagg

customer_reviews.title: My new best friend♡♡♡
customer_reviews.text: Wow best ever!!!! I stand on my feet all day with pain, until now! Thank you for this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle jean reads

customer_reviews.title: I was somewhat skeptical but he says it is perfect for him
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his foot massager! I was somewhat skeptical but he says it is perfect for him! My feet are too sensitive so I stay away from it but he loves to lounge in front of the television and enjoy a foot massage after work!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and comfy
customer_reviews.text: This foot massage machine does a great job and has plenty of different modes for different moods.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Reninger

customer_reviews.title: GREAT at the end of the day!
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful at the end of the day. I’m often on my feet for 12-16 hours on the convention center floor.
customer_reviews.author: Kooper01

customer_reviews.title: Amazon warehouse worker and my feet love it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worked in a fulfillment center for over 5 years. Your feet never get use to the concrete. Bought this for myself and I love it. Works out the knots. The heat function doesn’t really work. It creates friction, so that must be what they consider the ‘heating’ function. But overall, it works like it should.
customer_reviews.author: MacKinnley Stone

customer_reviews.title: Great to come home to
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I work events with very long hours on my feet. This is great to come home to.
customer_reviews.author: Stepheny C. Hof

customer_reviews.title: Not so good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure I would gift this product. Although it works fine and I trust Homemedics, the massage function spins too fast for the feet. Needs to be slower and there is only that one speed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Anyone w foot issues needs this
customer_reviews.text: Yes you want this. Helpful w foot issues when used regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: After a long day on my feet, this product really helps. The kneeding & massaging works. Sometimes I want the heat button, other days not needed. I would buy this product again & give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Campeau-Lewis

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this, he uses it almost every day. The warming feature doesn't seem warm enough but over all a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Laila Faizi

customer_reviews.title: Feels great in my sore and tired feet after work
customer_reviews.text: Feels great in my sore and tired feet after work. Only complaint I have is it's hard to relax in a recliner and put pressure down into it. Other than that it's nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Schwarz

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: Would be better if there were different massage & heat settings.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: The massage is wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar fasciitis. This massager really gets your feet deep. Massages like it's really needed to relax the muscles. It can be painful but a good painful because you can tell it's really working it. I hope this makes sense to my fellow plantar feet people. It is a his buy and I think better than a ice water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: JRedd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar fasciitus and this has been an big help.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I've ever bought for myself! I have severely bad plantar fascia in both of my feet, throughout entire foot. This massager has helped me immensely. However, I will say if you have very high arches though it will not hit the high point of arch.
customer_reviews.author: Aleasha Moriarty

customer_reviews.title: Great 👍
customer_reviews.text: Makes my feet feel so good relax them also. Our daughter wants one for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Great for tons of reasons
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my dad. I used it before giving it to him, because I'm a terrible person. Now I need one. He had mentioned multiple times how much he loves it after having been out in the cold.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: it feels like you're being tickled
customer_reviews.text: It is ok, I thought maybe the kneading would have a stronger effect. It does help with sore feet especially the heating element. If your feet experience cramping this product may not be a fit for you. I have found to place a little pressure on the product to feel the pressure other wise just as others have stated in their reviews, it feels like you're being tickled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my girlfriend who suffers from painful feet that make it difficult for her to sleep comfortably. She religiously uses this foot massager every night before bed and swears it alleviates her foot pain 100%. I would certainly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Terry McNamara

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting. Heavy. Doesn't get very hot.
customer_reviews.text: I think it's just the red light giving the illusion of great. But massages good.
customer_reviews.author: JKN

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & not bulky
customer_reviews.text: I work in the food industry & I'm on the feet all day long. When i get home i use this foot massager with heat for about 10-15 minutes & my feet feel great afterwards
customer_reviews.author: paulo dasilva

customer_reviews.title: Good unit
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good unit but would be “great” if it had a little vibration capability. Massager wheels work well
customer_reviews.author: rudy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great value and helps my legs feel better by rubbing my feet. I would suggest this item. Great seller fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jason H.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a five star were it not for the fact that my husband has high arches and this can not massage his feet where needed. On the other hand I love it ! I am on my feet a lot and this has help a lot in relaxing me. Cheaper than a foot massage which is nice and I can do anytime. The heat in it is ok not too hot more like a warmth that you feel
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Heaven
customer_reviews.text: There is the thing about ticklish feet that someone mentioned. It didn't take too long to overcome that. Moving the massager closer to my chair (90,degree angle) helps that. I look forward to my foot massage every evening. Seriously, I have to make myself turn it off after an hour or so. I'd take it to bed with me if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Looking for feet comfort
customer_reviews.text: I returned it. It was a lil rough on the feet.
customer_reviews.author: PDS

customer_reviews.title: ok for just plain foot massager but really wanted to for the heat
customer_reviews.text: Item was returned. Did not heat up enough to my liken.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Tickle, Tickle
customer_reviews.text: I am still evaluating this purchase. I am with one reviewer who found his feet tickled too much with this. I also find little relaxation with this due to the tickle factor. I find my feel are less ticklish when it has heated up, which takes quite awhile. Debating whether to return or not. I see the value, but don't feel it.
customer_reviews.author: Fitness lady

customer_reviews.title: Love this item,
customer_reviews.text: Love this item, My husband uses it on his feet every night. The heat is great because you can use it with or with out the heat. When sitting on the couch I put a book under the front to elevate it a little so I don't have to stretch my feet. sitting in a computer chair it works great flat on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: joann

customer_reviews.title: Great for my feet
customer_reviews.text: Great foot massager. Perfect placements of nodes. And I love the heat
customer_reviews.author: DIANNE PYDA

customer_reviews.title: Nice heating element
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my parents. My dad has neuropathy in his feet since his chemotherapy, and he says they feel better after using this. He does say that holding both feet down too hard is painful, so he prefers to use it one foot at a time.He also loves that it heats up.
customer_reviews.author: Adoo1980

customer_reviews.title: Great foot massager!
customer_reviews.text: I love this foot massager! It feels so good on your feet especially when you use the heat function. I leave it plugged in all the time by my couch and have multiple people come over who have used it and then bought it for themselves!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Better to use a golf ball for more precise release ...
customer_reviews.text: I expected to get more pressure and accuracy out of this massager on the soles of my feet but the feeling is only so-so when I use it. Better to use a golf ball for more precise release but since I can use this when I am sitting at the desk doing something else, it's better than not having it.
customer_reviews.author: Ohmydawg

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm without any issues
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm without any issues. You control the pressure with how hard you press against it with your feet. Does leave my feet feeling much better afterward. It is slightly awkward to use with my current setup but I cannot complain, it does everything I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: James Hanenkamp

customer_reviews.title: This is the best foot massager we have ever bought and it works ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best foot massager we have ever bought and it works so well. I know that my wife loves it when I rub her feet,but this help's out a lot and the heat is a plus,very happy with it,I did modify the legs with pvc pipe,to raise the massager to an acceptable angle
customer_reviews.author: John Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: nice!!
customer_reviews.text: this product gives a nice massage on the foot after a long day...or not!! you can have it heat while it massages or not too. I like it as if there is a specific part of my foot that needs a bit extra, it is not enclosed so you can reposition the foot to hit the spot you are lloking for. I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Very relaxing and feels great on my feet
customer_reviews.text: Very relaxing and feels great on my feet. I can place fret on lightly for a gentle massage or press down for deeper kneading. I feel it has helped with the pain in my feet. I wish it has a stand on the back though as I have to prop it up with a sneaker so it sits at an angle toward me but otherwise great.
customer_reviews.author: Muddy

customer_reviews.title: my whole family liked the foot massage
customer_reviews.text: so far worked really well. the heated function is a plus. my whole family liked the foot massage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Love it or Hate it
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not what I expected. I will use it sometimes but it doesn’t feel as good as I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha E.

customer_reviews.title: Get your foot rub on
customer_reviews.text: Wear socks! This thing is strong. I have had circulation so it's great for me
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great massager!
customer_reviews.text: Santa brought for wife;) This has been a big hit. Feels great and works perfect ( I had to try it of course) Simple operation. massage is perfect and heat temp is as well. Seems like a solid Massager. This should continue to be a hit when relaxing after those long days. Very Happy and good purchase
customer_reviews.author: BONES

product_meta.title: HoMedics, Triple Action Shiatsu Foot Massager with Heat, Deep-Kneading Rotating Heads & Soothing Heat, Large Design, Breathable Fabric & Toe Controls
product_meta.description:
Color:Black

Since our beginnings in 1987, HoMedics has created, innovated and refined a remarkable line of personal wellness products to become the recognized #1 Brand in Massage. The Triple Action Shiatsu Foot Massager with Heat combines our advancements in the field of massage with modern technology to create a rewarding, satisfying massage solution. 

The HoMedics Triple Action Shiatsu Foot Massager with Heat provides an invigorating shiatsu massage to rejuvenate tired arches and soles. Control the pressure of your massage by changing how hard you push down on the massage platform. The triple rotational heads deliver a circular kneading notion that travels up and down the length of your feet. The large platform design is ideal for both larger and smaller feet. 

The built in heat feature helps to stimulate blood flow to your heels, arches, soles, and toes – promoting pain relief, healing, and relaxation. Use the heat mechanisms with the Shiatsu or rolling massage to enhance relaxation. When using the heat function, the webbed fabric over the massage mechanism is designed to be breathable to enhance your comfort. 

Your HoMedics Triple Action Shiatsu Foot Massager with Heat is easy to use with simple toe touch controls which make it easy to change functions. Use your foot massager at home or even take it to the office to use under the desk in your cubicle. When you have tired, achy feet the Triple Action Shiatsu Foot Massager is perfect for easing your pain and tension. 

This HoMedics Triple Action Foot Massager comes with a long cord so that you can massage your feet in virtually any room!
feature_bullets: Deep Kneading Shiatsu : The Homedics Triple action Shiatsu Foot Massager with Heat delivers a circular kneading shiatsu Massage that Travels up and down the length of Your Feet, Rejuvenating tired arches and soles; The triple rotational heads Fully Massage from toe to heel, delivering a lifelike Massage Experience

OPTIONAL HEAT: The Triple action Shiatsu Foot Massager’s heat feature will help to further melt away tension and Enhance the Massage; The use of heat helps to penetrate tired muscles in Your arches and toes for Ultimate comfort; Turn the heat on to Enhance Your Massage Experience and soothe Your tired, achy Feet; The heat will help to Stimulate blood flow and promote healing

Considerate Design: The tripe action Shiatsu foot massager has a large platform Design that accommodates people with Larger feet; Anyone with any shoe size can enjoy this foot Massager; While using the heat feature, the breathable fabric prevents your feet from overheating and helps them to stay dry

Easy to Use : This foot Massager comes with Integrated Controls that are specially placed so that you can press them with Your toe; Use the toe touch Controls to Power on the Massager; Push the button again to turn on the heating feature
WHAT’S IncludeD WITH Your PURCHASE: 1 Homedics Triple action Shiatsu Foot Massager with Heat

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
